import './App.css'; import './styles/styles.css' import { useState, Fragment } from 'react'; import Operation from './components/operations/operation' import Action from './components/actions/action' function App() { const [num, setNum] = useState(); const handleSelectNum = (selectedNum)=>{ setNum(selectedNum); } const handleClear=()=>{ setNum(""); } return (
); } export default App;
